message.entry: Inputs must have the same size.
Inputs must be numeric or logical.
Operands to BIT Ops must be numeric.
Bit AND/OR/XOR do not accept complex operands.
Inputs must be signed or unsigned integers of the same class or scalar doubles.
Double inputs must have integer values in the integer range when mixed with integer inputs.
Double inputs must have integer values in the range of ASSUMEDTYPE.
ASSUMEDTYPE must be an integer type name.
Integer inputs cannot be assumed as any other types than their own types.
Invalid data type. First two arguments must be integer or double.
